text: Daniel Coulter Reynolds (born July 14, 1987) is an American singer, songwriter and record producer. He is the lead singer of the pop rock band Imagine Dragons. Reynolds also released an EP in 2011, titled Egyptian â€“ EP. It is a duo with his wife Aja Volkman as a group named Egyptian. He has been given the Songwriters Hall of Fame Hal David Starlight Award. ==References== Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Las Vegas Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American record producers Category:American rock singers Category:Imagine Dragons Category:People with ankylosing spondylitis
title: Dan Reynolds
